forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 4C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers this morning changing to rain showers for the afternoon. High 42F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low -3C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 29F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine early then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow showers developing late. Low 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 38F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers diminishing in the evening. A few breaks in the clouds late. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 63F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 66F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 69F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 70F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
